name: Run and Gun 2
overview:
Run and Gun 2 was produced by Konami in 1996.

A five-on-five basketball game. Compete for the championship either by yourself or team up with a friend. The game offers both joint and competitive play.

This is a direct sequel to Run Gun. The graphics have been majorly improved with the help of the Konami System GX.

A standard five-on-five basketball game. The gameplay is similar to the original but it seems slower overall.
